subject: Delivery Status
description_text:
Dear Simson Customer Service,



I am contacting you regarding my shipment, which is currently marked as delivered in your system. 

Order Nr: SSN5336 

Tracking Sf Express: SF6047202972170



However, I was not at home at the time of the alleged delivery.

Please provide me with the following information as soon as possible:




• The local German courier name

• The German domestic tracking / delivery number

• The exact delivery date and time

• The delivery address used

• Any proof of delivery, including a signature or photo if available



Without the German delivery number, I am unable to contact the local carrier to investigate this issue.



Thank you for your prompt assistance, as this matter is urgent.



Kind regards,

Leonardo Maierhofer

conversations.body_text: Hi Leonardo Maierhofer,     This is the tracking information, which shows the package has been signed for. May I confirm whether you have not received the shipment?

Hello Ive seen the Delivery Status on SF Express aswell but like I've already said I wasnt even home to get the package. Also nowhere on that tracking information does it say the Package has been signed for. 

How shall we proceed with this?
> 
>

Hi Leonardo Maierhofer,  We have already requested the proof of delivery from the courier. It usually takes one business day to receive their response. Please kindly wait a bit, and we will update you as soon as we hear back.

Hello is there any updates on this matter? 

Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Leonardo Maierhofer,      This is the delivery confirmation provided by the logistics company. Have you asked your family or neighbors if they saw this package?

Hey, 
as you can see it says the package was left in front of my door. But I already said I wasn’t even home when the delivery happened and didnt come home till 2 days later. When i got home it wasnt there. 
I asked my immediate neighbors and none of them have it. 
In my building packages get lost/stolen on a regular thats why I contacted you right away when I got the notification that it was delivered to try and prevent that issue but sadly it was to late.

How are you going to proceed in this case now? Cause I already paid for the item but to no fault of my own i receive it yet.

Kind regards
Leonardo Maierhofer

>

Hi Leonardo Maierhofer,    We're sorry to hear about this unfortunate situation, but we cannot be held solely responsible. We hope you understand. We can arrange for a replacement shipment and cover the shipping costs along with a portion of the product cost. However, you would need to cover the remaining portion of the product cost, approximately 90 euros. Would that be acceptable?

I’m sorry but that is totally unacceptable. I held up my part of the contract which is paying for the product but you couldn't come through on your part which would've been the successful handover of the product to me personally. 
So either you give me a better option that doesn't involve me spending money for an incident I had 0 fault of or you will have to work it out with the shipping company directly. 

Kinds regards, 
Leonardo Maierhofer

>

Hi Leonardo Maierhofer,    The logistics company will no longer be liable after the product is delivered, and we also have fulfilled our responsibilities. We cannot control the theft of the package. While we are willing to take on additional responsibility, we hope you will also share part of the responsibility. Thank you for your understanding.
